tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
quoteText: We also use standard technologies, such as cookies, web beacons, and other HTML tools, to collect information about your use of our Website, personalize your experience on our Website, monitor advertisements and other activities, and to record certain information.
